definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Adopted in 1990 when the north and south of Yemen unified.
sentences.chinese: 北叶门和南叶门于一九九零年统一时采用这面旗。

sentences.english: Yemeni Jewish girl sits with her grandmother outside a hotel in the northern Yemeni province of Saada January 24, 2007.
sentences.chinese: 在叶门北部萨达省，犹太女孩和祖母坐在旅馆外。

sentences.english: The explosives were also handed to him from members of Al-Qaeda in Yemen.
sentences.chinese: 爆裂物也是叶门的盖达成员交给他的。

sentences.english: Yemen is one of the least evangelized countries in the world.
sentences.chinese: 叶门是全球最少接触福音的国家之一。
